name: 16th International Conference on Modern Research in Management, Economics and Accounting
content: The International Conference on Modern Research in Management, Economics and Accounting is returning in 2024 for its 16th edition! Over the last 11 years, we’ve brought together hundreds of academics from around the world to this annual event and are excited to see that the interest in MEACONF is only growing over the years. MEACONF 2024 will take place on the 14th-16th of March 2024 in Berlin, Germany. The program is designed by the expert scientific committee, who carefully reviews and evaluates all abstract and paper submissions to ensure that every presentation – be it an oral or a poster one – adheres to the highest standards of quality. We invite you to submit your abstracts, which, if selected and registered, will be published in prestigious indexed journals, maximizing the reach of your research. The 16th annual International Conference on Modern Research in Management, Economics, and Accounting will be a festival of knowledge. Or take in a peek of the most recent developments in management, economics, and accounting by attending the upcoming edition of MEACONF as a Listener. It not only keeps you up to date, but it could also pique your interest in new topics and areas of research.
